message: Is there a way to block users? I've gotten a few requests from someone I don't know to join their random groups.
Me too. This one "marketing" dude won't stop inviting me to this freakin' SEO group...

Also, we need a moderator level in addition to the admin level. As it stands now a group's admin could promote a member to the admin level and then the new admin can revoke the admin permissions of the original admin. A moderator level could be used to give a member limited permissions like deleting/editing posts but not allow them to add or remove admins.
